text: The Dassault Falcon 20 is a French twin-turbojet aircraft. It was the first business jet built in France. It can carry two pilots and between eight and twelve passengers. == Militaries variant == The United States Coast Guard uses a special variant for search and rescue and reconnaissance called HU-25 Guardian. A similar aircraft is used by French Navy as Gardian for operations in Overseas France. Category:United States Coast Guard aircraft Falcon 20 Category:French military aircraft
title: Dassault Falcon 20
